mapper.select:
select B.clientgrp_name group_name, A.col1 group_idx, A.col2 sub_groups from(select col1, group_concat(col2) col2 from TEMP_T
where col1 in
#{item}
group by col1) A, CLIENTGRP_LIST B where A.col1 = B.clientgrp_idx order by B.clientgrp_name

select IFNULL(sum( case when A.invalid_flag = 0 and (A.reg_date > #{start_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and A.reg_date < #{end_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) then 1 else 0 end ) , 0) new_device, IFNULL(sum( case when A.invalid_flag = 1 and (A.delete_date > #{start_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and A.delete_date < #{end_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) then 1 else 0 end ) , 0) delete_device, IFNULL(sum( case when A.invalid_flag = 0 then 1 else 0 end ) , 0) running_device from CLIENT_MAST A where A.reg_date is not null and A.clientgrp_idx in
#{item1}

select os_type,
IFNULL(sum( case when invalid_flag = 0 and (reg_date > #{start_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and reg_date < #{end_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) then 1 else 0 end ) , 0) new_device, IFNULL(sum( case when invalid_flag = 1 and (delete_date > #{start_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delete_date < #{end_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) then 1 else 0 end ) , 0) delete_device, IFNULL(sum( case when invalid_flag = 0 then 1 else 0 end ) , 0) running_device from CLIENT_MAST where reg_date is not null
and os_type in
#{item2}
group by os_type

select A.policy_nowdate, A.policynow_idx policy_idx, A.policy_name, A.policy_desc, A.apply_device_count from(select policy_nowdate, policynow_idx, count(*) apply_device_count, (select X.policy_name from POLICY_MAST X where policy_idx = policynow_idx)as policy_name, (select Y.policy_desc from POLICY_MAST Y where policy_idx = policynow_idx)as policy_desc from CLIENT_MAST where policy_nowdate > #{start_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and policy_nowdate < #{end_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and policy_nowdate is not null group by policy_nowdate, policy_idx) A

select B.clientgrp_name group_name, A.client_name, A.ip_addr, A.os_type, A.policy_nowdate, A.sim_flag, C.policy_name, C.policy_desc from( select clientgrp_idx, client_name, ip_addr, os_type, policy_nowdate, sim_flag, policy_idx from CLIENT_MAST where policy_nowdate > #{start_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and policy_nowdate < #{end_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and policy_nowdate is not null) A, CLIENTGRP_LIST B, POLICY_MAST C where A.policy_idx = C.policy_idx and A.clientgrp_idx = B.clientgrp_idx
